H0.text: Who became the host of the BBC Radio 1 weekday breakfast show in September 2012. Chris Moyles

H1.text: Who became the host of the BBC Radio 1 weekday breakfast show in September 2012. Fearne Cotton

H2.text: Who became the host of the BBC Radio 1 weekday breakfast show in September 2012. Greg James

H3.text: Who became the host of the BBC Radio 1 weekday breakfast show in September 2012. Nick Grimshaw

A4.text: On 20 August 2018, James took over Radio 1 Breakfast from Nick Grimshaw.

A5.text: Greg James took over Radio 1 Breakfast from Nick Grimshaw on 20 August 2018.
